snippet: Voters on Tuesday approved a constitutional amendment authorizing up to seven casinos as part of a plan to attract jobs to economically distressed parts of upstate.
abstract: New York State voters approve constitutional amendment to expand casino gambling, authorizing as many as seven full-scale casinos as part of plan to bring jobs to economically distressed upstate regions; proposal, championed by Gov Andrew M Cuomo, passes with support of 57 percent of voters.

byline.contributor: Angela Macropoulos and Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Voters on Tuesday approved a constitutional amendment authorizing up to seven casinos as part of a plan to attract jobs to economically distressed parts of upstate.

headline.main: Expansion of Gambling in New York Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Expansion Of Gambling In New York Is Approved
